h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
h3_title: 4\. Additional Combat Styles Can Be Unlocked in the Skills Menu
content: Smash Stance is the standard stance you’ll begin the game with, but there are additional ones to be unlocked. With just one Spark, you can unlock the Pillar Stance and around Level 20, you can get the Thrust Stance. Once you’ve unlocked additional stances, you can swap between them during combat.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '4\. Additional Combat Styles Can Be Unlocked in the Skills Menu'.
The content is as follows:
Smash Stance is the standard stance you’ll begin the game with, but there are additional ones to be unlocked. With just one Spark, you can unlock the Pillar Stance and around Level 20, you can get the Thrust Stance. Once you’ve unlocked additional stances, you can swap between them during combat.
